content.query:
--SurrogateKey: ID
--Busniess/Natural Key: Fingerprint, ValidTo (with Is_deleted=0 in only 1 instance?)
  
--OR

--Busniess Key: ID
--SurrogqteKey: Hash of Fingerprint & ValidTo - toString(crc32(Fingerprint, ValidTo))

--EmpId, SurrogateKey, ......IsCurrent, ProcessDate
--EmpId exists in source and is the business key. EmpID used in LookUp
--Surrogate key created for each employee. Surrogate key added as derived col in Iscurrent task. toString(crc32(EmpID, EmpFunction))

IF  EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[Dim].[PaymentCard]') AND type in (N'U'))
DROP TABLE [Dim].[PaymentCard];

CREATE TABLE Dim.PaymentCard
  (  
  ID              BIGINT IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL,
  NameOnCard      VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL,
  PANTruncation   VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL,
  ValidFrom       DATE NULL,
  ValidTo         DATE NULL,--NOT NULL,
  Token           VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  Fingerprint     VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  Issuer          VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
  CardProvider    VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
  Slug            VARCHAR(50) NULL,--NOT NULL,
  CardType        VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL,
  CardStatus      VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL,
  IsDeleted       BIT NOT NULL,
  Country         VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL,
  CCYCode         VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL,
  CardCreateDate  DATETIME NULL,--20210301NOT NULL,
  CardUpdateDate  DATETIME NULL,
  EffFromDate     DATETIME NULL,
  EffToDate       DATETIME NULL,
  ProcessDate     DATETIME NOT NULL,
  IsCurrent       BIT NOT NULL,-- DEFAULT 1, --IsDeleted look very similar. Do we need both IsDeleted & IsCurrent?
  SourcePCKey     INT NOT NULL,
  RestrictionKey  INT NULL
  --PLLLinks      VARCHAR(4000) NULL
  --PSPToken      VARCHAR(100),
  --EventID       SMALLINT
  )  
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);

  UpdateDate      DATETIME NULL,

  SourcePCKey     INT NOT NULL
  --PLLLinks        VARCHAR(4000) NULL
  --PSPToken        VARCHAR(100),
  --EventID         SMALLINT
*/
